item.title: Shock Absorber Shock Absorber B5063 Sports Bra – White/Grey
item.description:
Introducing a new sports bra that flexes with your body and lifestyle, the Shock Absorber B5063 Sports Bra offers great shape and exceptional support.

The flexible titanium under wire moves and flexes with your body while the smooth, seamless, moulded cups and padded, soft non-rub hook and eye will keep irritation at bay. Made from moisture wicking sports performance fabric that will pull sweat away from your body. Customise your style with the adjustable back fastening with racer back option.

  • Shock Absorber products combine a unique understanding of women's bodies with advanced design and performance fabrics.

  • Their sports bras are scientifically proven to reduce 3D breast movement giving you ultimate support, comfort and confidence during exercise.
item.g:google_product_category: Clothing & Accessories > Clothing > Activewear > Active Undergarments > Sports Bras

item.title: WOMENS OUTLET Nike Adjust U-Bra - Purple
item.description:
The Nike U-Back Bra: Excellent mobility and custom fit. It's all about the right support. The Nike Fully Adjustable U-Back Running Bra is all about delivering. Featuring straps and a chest band that adjust to your unique shape, this bra has soft moulded cups for added comfort and support. Ergonomic seams that maps the natural contours of your body for a more comfortable fit.
  • Mesh panel at back for increased airflow
  • Benefiting from U-back shape for enhanced range of motion
  • Flat seam construction to help reduce irritation while you run

Built with no side seams for reduced distraction and made from Coolmax fabric that helps to keep you dry and comfortable.

item.description: Ideal for activities like yoga and pilots, this tight fitting top with inner shelf support features unique racerback design with bonded panel for free movement and improved postures. With flat seams construction that minimises rubbing and irritation, the front and back mesh panels ensure a maximum ventilation. item.title: Berlei Berlei Underwired Running Bra - Black/Purple
item.description:
A Berlei best seller with maximum support and minimum bounce thanks to ultrasonic welding. Tried and tested by professional athletes, loved by runners everywhere! Offers full coverage moulded cup for natural fit and to minimise bounce. Lightly padded strap reduces pressure and tension on the shoulders while the ultrasonic welding ensures suitability for high impact sports even in larger cup sizes. Wire casing ensures comfort and enhanced support throughout your workout with an easy on, easy off just like a normal bra.
  • Breathable wire channelling wicks away sweat to keep you dry
  • Double layered fabric for extra softness against the skin
  • Two ways to wear - fasten normally or cross-over straps
  • The flat wing design with no hard corners and no irritating labels

item.title: Triumph Triumph Fusion Star N Bra - Black/Red
item.description:
This two-toned, full-cup sports bra has what it takes to keep you supported as you focus on your workout. Doubled cups provide the highest level of support to take on even the highest impact sports. Bonded seams enable a smooth, streamlined fit. This bra keeps you comfortable during even your most intense workouts.
  • Suitable for high-impact sports
  • Quick-drying fabric keeps you cool and dry
  • anti-bacterial properties eliminate odours
  • Bonded edges ensure a smooth fit for maximum comfort

item.title: Panache Panache Sports Bra - Pink LIMITED EDITION
item.description:
If you're a D cup or larger, experts recommend wearing the best support possible every time you exercise.

The Panache Sport Bra - Pink LIMITED EDITION provides just that. By encapsulating your breasts - lifting, shaping and supporting them from all sides - in testing by Progressive Sports Technology, it reduces breast bounce by up to 83%. And provides the ultimate support for the fuller bust, right up to an H cup. With wide padded straps, breathable fabric, silicone-wrapped underwires and the option to wear as a racer back, Panache Sport doesn't just provide the ultimate support. It also offers supreme comfort.

  • Reduces breast bounce up to 83%

  • Breathable fabric

  • Silicone-wrapped underwires

item.title: Panache Panache Sports Bra - Grey
item.description:
If you're a D cup or larger, experts recommend wearing the best support possible every time you exercise. The Panache Sport Bra provides just that. By encapsulating your breasts - lifting, shaping and supporting them from all sides - in testing by Progressive Sports Technology, it reduces breast bounce by up to 83%. And provides the ultimate support for the fuller bust, right up to an H cup. With wide padded straps, breathable fabric, silicone-wrapped underwires and the option to wear as a racer back, Panache Sport doesn't just provide the ultimate support. It also offers supreme comfort.

  • Reduces breast bounce up to 83%

  • Breathable fabric

  • Silicone-wrapped underwires

item.title: Berlei Berlei Underwired Running Bra - Purple
item.description:
A Berlei best seller with maximum support and minimum bounce thanks to ultrasonic welding. Tried and tested by professional athletes, loved by runners everywhere! Offers full coverage moulded cup for natural fit and to minimise bounce. Lightly padded strap reduces pressure and tension on the shoulders while the ultrasonic welding ensures suitability for high impact sports even in larger cup sizes. Wire casing ensures comfort and enhanced support throughout your workout with an easy on, easy off just like a normal bra.
  • Breathable wire channelling wicks away sweat to keep you dry
  • Double layered fabric for extra softness against the skin
  • Two ways to wear - fasten normally or cross-over straps
  • The flat wing design with no hard corners and no irritating labels

item.title: NIKE NIKE X Back Bra 2.0 - Black/Black/Cool Grey
item.description:
The Nike X-Back Bra 2.0 Training Sports Bra has a flattering fit with premium clasps, softer trims and stronger elastics than traditional sports bras, offering maximum support during the toughest workouts. A lightweight, super-comfortable butterfly closure at the back of the elastic chest band is fully adjustable, allowing for multi-cup sizing, easy on and off and full range of motion.
  • The straps are also adjustable for a customized fit
  • Fabric: Dri-FIT 87% nylon/13% spandex

item.title: Purelime Purelime Compression Bra HRM - Black
item.description:
This PureLime Compression Bra HMR is made without irritating side seams and regulable shaped padded shoulder straps. The coolmax specific material keeps you cool also it has a special heart rate sensor on the inside of the product which can be attached to the outside of the Bra. The bra has side support for lift and to reduce side movement and it has compression strap to restrict up and down movement.
  • Anti stretch cup separation
  • Attach the heart rate transmitter directly to the outside of the sports bra

item.title: Shock Absorber Shock Absorber S4490 D+ Max Sports Bra Top - Bluebird/R
item.description:
A consistant best seller for the last few years, this popular maximum support sports bra provides ultimate support even for the D+ cup sizes, making it perfect for high impact sports.

The stylish crop top look of this bra means it can be worn as an outer or under garment. Fully adjustable back opening for easy on and off, lightly padded shoulder straps & adjustable double hook/eye back fastener give a perfect fit. Racer back for extra support.

  • Powermesh side panels for breathability

  • Coolmax fabric keeps you comfortable however hard you work

  • Fully adjustable back opening for easy on and off

item.title: Shock Absorber Shock Absorber S5044 Run Sports Bra - Bluebird/Rose
item.description:
Voted SoActive Best Bra for 2013 When you run, your breasts move in a repetitive figure of 8 pattern. This continuous up & down and side-to-side movement can cause rubbing and chafing. To combat this, Shock Absorber have created the S5044, a bra specifically designed for running. the award-winning

Ultimate RUN bra reduces bounce by up to 78%* and provides ultimate friction-free comfort. Made from moisture-wicking, breathable fabric, sports performance fabrics. The seam-free inner and concealed elastic under arms reduces any rubbing or chafing

  • Non-slip, wide padded adjustable straps

  • Full back opening for easy on and off
item.g:google_product_category: Clothing & Accessories > Clothing > Activewear > Active Undergarments > Sports Bras

item.title: Shock Absorber Shock Absorber S00H1 Active Flexi Wire - White
item.description:
The Shock Absorber new S00H1 Active Flexi Wire Bra is the perfect bra for those women who wear a normal everyday underwired bra to exercise in. Great to wear as an all day transition bra from work to gym. It has moulded spacer cups to prevent nipple showing and a flexible U-shaped underwire.
  • Wide, padded and fully adjustable straps with a cross-over option
  • Great to wear as an all day transition bra

item.title: Berlei Berlei Underwired Running Bra - Coral
item.description:
A Berlei best seller with maximum support and minimum bounce thanks to ultrasonic welding. Tried and tested by professional athletes, loved by runners everywhere! Offers full coverage moulded cup for natural fit and to minimise bounce. Lightly padded strap reduces pressure and tension on the shoulders while the ultrasonic welding ensures suitability for high impact sports even in larger cup sizes. Wire casing ensures comfort and enhanced support throughout your workout with an easy on, easy off just like a normal bra.
  • Breathable wire channelling wicks away sweat to keep you dry
  • Double layered fabric for extra softness against the skin
  • Two ways to wear - fasten normally or cross-over straps
  • The flat wing design with no hard corners and no irritating labels
item.g:google_product_category: Clothing & Accessories > Clothing > Activewear > Active Undergarments > Sports Bras

item.title: NIKE NIKE Pro Bra - Fusion Pink/White
item.description: Like the plain white tee or the little black dress, the Nike Pro Bra is minimalist perfection. A racerback is used for comfort and enhanced range of motion during upper body workouts. Compression fit design creates the perfect hold making this bra ideal for medium-impact sports like cycling, dance and cardio classes. Flat flock seams are used to reduce irritation caused by chaffing. The Pro Bra is suited best for A, B and C cups.
item.g:google_product_category: Clothing & Accessories > Clothing > Activewear > Active Undergarments > Sports Bras

item.title: Purelime Purelime Seamless Bra Top - Grey Melange
item.description:
Purelime Seamless Underwear is feminine and very stretchy. The sporty Purelime Seamless Bra Top can be used on it's own own or as a base layer, with or without your sports bra underneath. You will get powerful moisture-wicking technology with the support you need for light impact activities such as yoga and weight lifting. Tactel fabric allows genuine regulation of body temperature. Seamless technology gives you maximum freedom of movement.
  • Seamless technology
  • Double layer
  • Ventilated back
  • Seasonal colours
  • Encapsulating lining
item.g:google_product_category: Clothing & Accessories > Clothing > Activewear > Active Undergarments > Sports Bras

item.title: NIKE NIKE X Back Bra 2.0 - Geranium/Cool Grey
item.description:
The Nike X-Back Bra 2.0 Training Sports Bra has a flattering fit with premium clasps, softer trims and stronger elastics than traditional sports bras, offering maximum support during the toughest workouts. A lightweight, super-comfortable butterfly closure at the back of the elastic chest band is fully adjustable, allowing for multi-cup sizing, easy on and off and full range of motion.
  • The straps are also adjustable for a customized fit
  • Fabric: Dri-FIT 87% nylon/13% spandex
item.g:google_product_category: Clothing & Accessories > Clothing > Activewear > Active Undergarments > Sports Bras

item.title: NIKE Nike Pro Bra - Carbon Heather/Black
item.description:
Like the plain white tee or the little black dress, the Nike Pro Bra is minimalist perfection.

A racerback is used for comfort and enhanced range of motion during upper body workouts. Compression fit design creates the perfect hold making this bra ideal for medium-impact sports like cycling, dance and cardio classes.

  • Flat flock seams are used to reduce irritation caused by chaffing.

  • The Pro Bra is suited best for A, B and C cups.

item.title: Shock Absorber Shock Absorber S5044 Run Sports Bra - Purple/Lime
item.description:
Voted SoActive Best Bra for 2013 When you run, your breasts move in a repetitive figure of 8 pattern. This continuous up & down and side-to-side movement can cause rubbing and chafing. To combat this, Shock Absorber have created the S5044, a bra specifically designed for running. the award-winning

Ultimate RUN bra reduces bounce by up to 78% and provides ultimate friction-free comfort. Made from moisture-wicking, breathable fabric, sports performance fabrics. The seam-free inner and concealed elastic under arms reduces any rubbing or chafing

  • Non-slip, wide padded adjustable straps
  • Full back opening for easy on and off

item.title: WOMENS OUTLET Berlei Non-Wired Running Bra - Black
item.description: This extra soft bra gives both maximum support and minimum bounce because during manufacture a unique process of ultrasonic welding is used to ensure all the bra's components are held firmly together to allow for the extra stresses of constant running. This coupled with the use of soft double-layered breathable fabric ensures it is one of the most comfortable running bras available today.

item.title: NIKE NIKE Pro Bra - Purple Haze/Dark Raisin
item.description:
Like the plain white tee or the little black dress, the Nike Pro Bra is minimalist perfection.

A racerback is used for comfort and enhanced range of motion during upper body workouts. Compression fit design creates the perfect hold making this bra ideal for medium-impact sports like cycling, dance and cardio classes.

  • Flat flock seams are used to reduce irritation caused by chaffing.

  • The Pro Bra is suited best for A, B and C cups.

item.description:

Fabric: Body: Dri-FIT 51% nylon/38% polyester/11% spandex. Interlining: Dri-FIT 80% polyester/20% spandex.
  • Low impact
  • Color-blocking for athletic style
  • Mesh T-back delivers superb breathability and range of motion

item.title: Moving Comfort Moving Comfort Fineform - Punch/Black
item.description:
Bringing beautiful sophistication to low impact sports bras. The Fineform bra by Moving Comfort has an innovative unicup design molds around curves, providing great shape and unsurpassed comfort. Back J-hook secures straps together to create a racerback.
  • Low impact
  • Bonded neckline, straps, armholes and back
  • DriLayer Adapt straps stretch for a personalised fit
  • Soft, brushed bottom band streches for a personalised fit
  • Adjustable, soft-padded back closure
  • Encapsulation

item.title: Moving Comfort Moving Comfort Hot Shot - Black/Powerpink
item.description:
Designed with yoga in mind, this sweetheart of a sports bra is super soft, feminine, and moves effortlessly with the body. Ideal for a shallow to semi-full cup size, the Hot Shot Bra by Moving Comfort supports the breasts by encapsulating and compressing.
  • It has removable, moderate-contoured seam-free cups for padding
  • Minimal back coverage allows for enhanced range of motion
  • Fabric-covered bottom band adds softness to fit
  • DriLayer Adapt straps stretch for a personalized fit
  • Fabric: 85% polyester / 15% spandex

item.description:
Purelime Seamless Underwear is feminine and very stretchy. The sporty Purelime Seamless Bra Top can be used on it's own own or as a base layer, with or without your sports bra underneath. You will get powerful moisture-wicking technology with the support you need for light impact activities such as yoga and weight lifting. Tactel fabric allows genuine regulation of body temperature. Seamless technology gives you maximum freedom of movement.

The Womens Odlo Long Sleeve Crew Neck Evolution Warm Thermal underwear is insulating and comfortable, with a seam free structure and precision laser cut construction. Very light but with the warmth enhancing close weave you hardly know you are wearing it. The Zoned Functionality ensures that any hot spots of the body receive maximum ventilation whilst the areas of the body that are more susceptible to the cold, receive superior thermal defence.
  • Anti Odour control treatment ensure all day long freshness
  • 3D Fit and precision laser cut construction, design is structured around your body
  • Tight thermal weave fabricated Thermal Baselayer with a close fitted structure without compression

item.description:
Sweat-wicking power, Low Impact Support. The Nike Pro Indy Training Sports Bra is made with Dri-FIT fabric and a double-layer construction for lasting comfort and a supportive fit during a workout. Fabric: Body: Dri-FIT 51% nylon/38% polyester/11% spandex. Interlining: Dri-FIT 80% polyester/20% spandex.
  • Low impact
  • Color-blocking for athletic style
  • Mesh T-back delivers superb breathability and range of motion

item.description:

  • Material 89% polyester, 11% elastane

item.title: NIKE Nike Pro Bra - Black/White
item.description:
Like the plain white tee or the little black dress, the Nike Pro Bra is minimalist perfection. A racerback is used for comfort and enhanced range of motion during upper body workouts. Compression fit design creates the perfect hold making this bra ideal for medium-impact sports like cycling, dance and cardio classes.

  • Flat flock seams are used to reduce irritation caused by chaffing.

  • The Pro Bra is suited best for A, B and C cups.

item.title: Shock Absorber Shock Absorber B5044 Run Sports Bra - White/Silver
item.description:
Voted SoActive Best Bra for 2013 When you run, your breasts move in a repetitive figure of 8 pattern. This continuous up & down and side-to-side movement can cause rubbing and chafing. To combat this, Shock Absorber have created the B5044, a bra specifically designed for running. the award-winning

Ultimate RUN bra reduces bounce by up to 78% and provides ultimate friction-free comfort. Made from moisture-wicking, breathable fabric, sports performance fabrics. The seam-free inner and concealed elastic under arms reduces any rubbing or chafing

  • Non-slip, wide padded adjustable straps
  • Full back opening for easy on and off

item.description:
The N109 is hugely popular amoungst women with a bigger bust, who want to do high impact sports without being worried about the level of support they have. Classic design with improved silhouette. Wide, padded & adjustable straps for optimal fit. A broader chest band & soft, non rub hook & eye for comfort. The multi section dual layer fabric structure ensures each breast is fully encapsulated with strong stretch fabric.
  • Holds breasts firmly to the body allowing you to exercise in comfort
  • Moisture-wicking, breathable, high performance fabrics.

item.title: Panache Panache Sports Bra - White
item.description:
If you're a D cup or larger, experts recommend wearing the best support possible every time you exercise.

The Panache Sport Bra provides just that. By encapsulating your breasts - lifting, shaping and supporting them from all sides - in testing by Progressive Sports Technology, it reduces breast bounce by up to 83%. And provides the ultimate support for the fuller bust, right up to an H cup. With wide padded straps, breathable fabric, silicone-wrapped underwires and the option to wear as a racer back, Panache Sport doesn't just provide the ultimate support. It also offers supreme comfort.

  • Reduces breast bounce up to 83%

  • Breathable fabric

  • Silicone-wrapped underwires

item.title: NIKE Nike Fully Adjustable X Back Bra - White
item.description:
The Nike X-Back Bra 2.0 Training Sports Bra has a flattering fit with premium clasps, softer trims and stronger elastics than traditional sports bras, offering maximum support during the toughest workouts. A lightweight, super-comfortable butterfly closure at the back of the elastic chest band is fully adjustable, allowing for multi-cup sizing, easy on and off and full range of motion.
  • The straps are also adjustable for a customized fit
  • Fabric: Dri-FIT 87% nylon/13% spandex
